SEARCH

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
Camp
public class Camp extends Object
Represents a camp created by staff that students can register for as participants or committee members.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Camp(CampInformation campInformation, Staff staffInCharge)
    Creates a new camp with the given campInformation, staffInCharge.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(CampInformation campInformation, Staff staffInCharge)
      Creates a new camp with the given campInformation, staffInCharge. Initialises the following lists: campAttendeesList, CampCommitteeMembersList, enquiries, suggestions, WithdrawnStudentList, CampMemberList.
      Parameters:
      campInformation - This is the camp infroamtion.
      staffInCharge - This is the staff in charge of the camp.
